title: 关于MOTD
author: 惆丿怅
txt_content:
[D[D[19:05:22 WARN]: Exception in thread "ColorMOTDAnimThread" 


>[2K[D[D[19:05:22 WARN]: java.util.ConcurrentModificationException


>[2K[D[D[19:05:22 WARN]:         at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)


>[2K[D[D[19:05:22 WARN]:         at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.next(Unknown Source)


>[2K[D[D[19:05:22 WARN]:         at net.andylizi.colormotd.anim.listener.戋.run(MOTDPacketListener.java:148)


>[2K[D[D[19:05:22 WARN]:         at java.util.TimerThread.mainLoop(Unknown Source)


>[2K[D[D[19:05:22 WARN]:         at java.util.TimerThread.run(Unknown Source)

如图，AnimColorMOTD插件，一刷新，就会出现这个报错，然后就不会继续动态显示
